content.detailedDescription:
This video was shot out the window of a passenger jet flying from washington state back to california.
the camera was aimed at a cloud formation,
when you see an object fly by at the top of the screen,
it was noticed only later while watching the video.
i didnt take this video my coworker did and he never noticed this until i pointed it out to him.
another jet? missile? rocket? in either case it looks like its moving pretty good notice that after he pans back with the camera the object and its trail is totally gone.
content.summary: Interesting video

content.detailedDescription: From dane street beach in beverly ,ma..Every evening since this summer there have been crafts in the sky over salem willows and that point there in to the ocean. 2 or 3 that appear to cirlce ...Feels like they are black ops or something? because they don't have sound like a helicopter and move differently. there are more since this summer. there is also some activity in the water that they appear to put a spot light on from time to time and then shut off the lights and hang around ..Flying back and forth betwwne the ocean just off the tip to the towers of a plant in salem.  there has been more activity and since the summer. it drives me crazy to see this going on..And feel that something is going on right in front of everyone. it could be some project i am unaware of but i don't think so at all.  since that time i started becomeing aware of this activity..A couple months ago i also on night had different craft follow me..At the time that was at meadow road in beverly...It followed over me down the street and back ( it had 2 like spot lights that when in a circle ) eventually it just went from 2 lights in a circle to them going in a line and taking off and disappearing.  this is all new to me to see this stuff. i am just tired of watching this activity every time i go in that dane street beach area or salem willows..Cause i know it is not normal. please investigate this and let me know what the heck is going on ..Just for my own information please.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: There are crafts that are have been at in the air every night since the summer, i don't know if they are ufo or american..But nothing i am aware of

content.detailedDescription: It was between 10-30-11:00 wednesday night. i went outside of my house to grab my wallet from the work truck when i looked up and saw what i thought was a star i hadn't noticed before.  it was a large ball mostly white with a slight tint of yellow to it. i was starring right at it for several seconds when all of a sudden it glowed a little bit brighter, then excellerated away at an incredible speed until i couldn't see it.  there wasn't any movement before it took off, it just hovered there in the sky just above the trees across from my house. no noise what so ever,no blinking lights like commercial plans have to have, and no tail light a comet leaves behind. i have no idea what it was, and i have to admit it startled and scared me a little bit.  i really wish i had a video camera or a digital camera to have caught it.  but it didn't stick around long enough for that
content.summary: White ball of light with a little bit of yellow tint to it.  larger than any star in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to my car's oil change appointment. while driving out of the area i live in, i noticed first a helicopter (white with blue, fairly large one), flying to the east. then i noticed nearby, to the west, just hanging in the air what appeared to be a roundish white orb, for lack of better terms. it was hard to tell how high up, but in relation to the helicopter that was leaving the area which was about regular cruising altitude you always see helicopters at when they are flying around your area, i would guess about 800 yards to 2,000 yards high? back to the pure white orb. it was bizarre, because i was really trying to perceive it as a balloon. but at the relatively low altitude that it was at, i would have expected a much sharper outline to it, as i've seen balloons rising up at around this altitude, and they look more defined. this thing was perfectly still in an absolutely clear blue sky, but it was kind of fuzzy (at times?). hard to explain. then it actually seemed to morph into two orbs right next to each other. also, it stayed absolutely stationary in the sky. i was driving about 20 miles an hour after getting out of the complex i live in, where as i was leaving, driving like 10 miles an hour, constantly watching this thing just hang there, slightly to the north and west of me. definitely not rising, just hanging above n. mission bay drive. as i turned onto that road, wanting desperately to stop, but not wanting to miss my darn appointment, now the thing is basically right over the car, enough so that i have to stick my head out of the window and look up (it still hadn't seemed to move, it's just that my direction was putting me more and more below the object). now i'm on a fairly busy road, although not much on a mid saturday. i'm glancing at other cars and drivers to see if anyone else is looking up at this thing. it was low enough to see that it was not a balloon, or if it was, it was not drifting or going up at all, just hanging there in the sun. next thing was i got to the light where i had to turn, a red light. i look up to see it again, and low and behold it has completely disappeared from site. i mean no where. i would guess that i had my eyes off it for no more than 20 seconds, tops, having to keep my eyes on the darn road, and next time i look up, seconds later it has disappeared. then i turned into the service station (about 2 miles from my house, at the most), jump out of the car and i am looking everywhere in the sky for this thing, and there is nothing at all in the sky. today in san diego we are experiencing absolutely amazing weather, by the way, absolutely clear blue sky. when i say the sky is empty, i mean no trace of this thing. if it had been a balloon, i surely would have seen it again, no way it could have gone like that.
content.summary: Pure white orb-like shape, seemed to morph into two then back to one.

content.detailedDescription:
En route home from a follow-up visit to my doctor, my wife and i turned south on ridge road. the location is roughly 3/4 mile from the city airport. i tend to check the sky regularly as i do a quite a bit of aircraft photography and am always interested in any planes in our area. 

i could hear a jet coming in low, under the cloud cover, making an approach. looking out the side window, i spotted a business jet coming in low -- possibly at around 1000'. as it passed i noticed an unlit, spherical object following closely behind. i'd estimate it as possibly 4-5' across, and following the jet at something like 30' distance. 

i mentioned this to my wife, but am unsure if she actually registered it, though she stated she did see it. my initial impression was that there was some sort of balloon attacked to the plane, which seemed somewhat odd. you don't really use a jet as an advertising tow, and a small sphere isn't exactly an advertising banner. nor was it a drogue 'chute -- the only other thing i could think of, but which would obviously not be used on a commercial or private jet, not would it be deployed in flight.

as the plane continued southwards, the object swung off to the left (eastern) side and peeled away from the jet's path, movingly to the east with a slightly upward cant. i lost sight of it at that point, due to slowing traffic in our lane requiring my attention. i was unable to locate the object when i looked back.

conditions were overcast and cold (temperatures in the middle 30s. moderate breeze.
content.summary: Peculiar object in close proximity to aircraft on landing approach

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving i saw this bright light aiming down at first i thought it was a plane turning but after a few minutes i noticed it did not move, then i saw a second light they moved around about 11 o'clock high then one of them came down and headed strait up and disappeared. just then as i glanced around there was this huge blimp looking object with three bright lights moving slowly. the bright lights appeared to be rotating, as it moved left to right in a slow motion, i stared at it for a while as it disappeared into some clouds on my right side. the objects to my left at 11 o'clock was clear as can be. months before that coming across hwy 29 west bound from i-35 halfway towards hwy 183 on my motorcycle at exactly 12 midnight i noticed a bright light coming fast behind me, at first i thought it was a car but coming so fast i thought this driver will not see me and may hit me at that speed. i could tell the speed as i glanced through my mirror and it was moving way too fast. this light was lighting up the whole road. as i edged towards the shoulder the light passed me about 1 o'clock high. it was almost a blinding light. i could hear like a crackling sound as it passed over me.  the fourth and only time i had seen another set of lights going north/west almost 45 minutes from santa anna there appeared in the sky a group of lights about 1 o'clock high just as they appeared they disappeared. these have been the only times i have ever seen anything like this. since then i have been curious as to what they are. i tend to beleive these were not aircrafts the way they were moving and swirling around as for the blimp like object i had never seen such brightness glancing at the blimp it almost looked metalic as it slowly disappear into some of the clouds and the light reflected that was when i noticed how large it was. this was just amazing. for some that may think only nuts report this well, i am college educated and have worked in professional fields and very competent. i do beleive in our god and savior but somehow would like to find out more of what others in the govt want to keep from us.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: First; two seperate lights about 11 o'clock high, second blimp shape with 3  bright lights about 2 o'clock high

content.detailedDescription:
Dear sir,

i stay in a villa in sharjah and i was with my baby boy and two nephews ( 10 & 12 years of age) in my verandah, when i looked at the sky to show stars to my baby. to mine as well as my nephews surprise, i saw a star like but a bit huge and more shiny and moving almost at the speed of the jet. it travelled from north west towards east and stopped a little far away from the sharjah airport.

it was there for a couple of minute when suddenly we were able to see that brightness reducing and seemed like rays emanating from a point. suddenly it started to fade and it was gone in 10-15 seconds. (could have been traveling in vertical direction)

myself being an engineer, i know the difference between other ariel objects and i am sure it was not a planne.

colour was almost yellowish, in between orange.

i have two witness also, being my nephews and i am waiting to know if there are more people witnessing that.

please mail me if you know about other guys seen that or any articles in those regard.

i apologize as i was not able to take any pics or video, as i was in my pajamas and just strolling around.

regards,
content.summary: Star like fireball sighting with varying travelling speed

content.detailedDescription: On october 31,1999 around 4 pm my wife at the time and i were on our way to my aunts house for a halloween party. my aunt lived out in the country so we were taking the back roads of lindsay ca. we headed down strathmore ave and turned down tulare road . when we arrived at the corner of tulare road and honolulu when i noticed a low flying craft headed towards my vehicle heading west to east . it was traveling approx. 10 to 15 miles an hour. i got out of my vehicle as it approached to get a better look. i was baffled at what i was witnessing. i was at the time enlisted in the united states navy and stationed in lemoore california working with f/a -18 and the craft matched no known military aircraft. the craft i witnessed was diamond shaped ,dark in color almost like a dark charcoal color with many flashing lights at the bottom.  i want to say the lights resembled led lights as they rapidly flashed in random order. it cruised by about 100 feet away from us and about 50 feet above. there was absolutely no sound . i lost sight of the craft after two minutes or so as it disappeared over the foothills. my ex wife also witnessed the same event. i would also like to note that i was sober at the time of incident.
content.summary: Diamond shaped aircraft cruising 50-100 feet

content.detailedDescription: We were looking out the front window and a object going approx. 300 mph east near shasta way. blue flash. our view was a light bar on a police car with no red.
content.summary: Blue sphere jets across sky

content.detailedDescription: Same as above
content.summary: 7 big bright lights formed in the shape of a v there was a thick black object connecting the lights then it zoomed out of sight

content.detailedDescription: Me and my older brother where coming back to oklahoma from visiting my dad. and we were on the west side of little rock arkansaw, going west .When i noticed in the sky what looked like a green star and a blue star real close together. and i realized that the were closer to the ground then stars far away. at first they just sat there then the green one took off realy fast, faster then any plane or rockett that have ever seen. and the blue one caught up with it just as fast. and then they kinda danced around each other for 5 to 6 seconds and shot off above the tree line. and that was the last i saw them. i slaped my brother on the leg and said did you see that. he was like yeah, i saw the whole thing. they looked like orbs or balls of light. but they where very distinctive of each other. you could tell that they were seperate. i was amazed i hadnt seen any sightings since i was a kid. and
content.summary: Chasing each other.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at homes on zillow.Com. 1 at 293 brae burn drive for sale. its still there now but not for sale. enter the address and then click on the pop up box. then click on the birds eye view and map then to street view option. go to the right of the white house with a car and truck and to the trees between that house and house on right. there is an orange disc shaped object in the trees and a line of white smoke going straight up. if you then go back to the white house and double click on the floating box and then pan up the white smoke and orange disc and a funny cloud are right above the house. these homes are directly in front of a huge cemetary that is up the hill behind them. just wondering what it is.  thanks
content.summary: Orange object and smoke trail in trees and sky

content.detailedDescription: First of all, i would like to assure you that i will not waist your time. i have never seen anything like this before. for about 6 mounths now i have noticed several strobing star or orb like objects over gainesville fl. one in particular that has not disapeared like others. this object is bright, brighter than any other star. more so than sirus. also it flashes red and blue and orange sometimes green. not an aircraft i see it every night when it's clear. for hours it sits there. another thing is the light is not constant it dims out sometimes completely disapearing in front of me. two days ago i was driving home and spotted it out my window and seemed like i was passing it. i could tell by the stars behind it that it was lower than stars. it was more like i drove around it. i have also seen an orange orb around the object. please contact me i want the truth as much as you do.
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: This is very important news. i have witnesses and evidence send someone asap!!! theres something in the eastern sky very bright. im 100% sure not a star!

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 14 at the time, and i was on vacation for the entire summer with my mother visitng my grandfather and uncle in my mother's hometown of balatonfured. we stayed with my grandfatherfor theduration of the entire summer and he lived on a rther large hill. this hill was populated by german tourists and older naturalists, so i was lonely for most of the time. i had actually spent most of my time reading a book on thestring theory and using my imagination to keep myself busy. being at a higher altitude than i'm used to, the stars were always wonderously bright in the sky, and on clear nights you would be foolish not to spend a few minutes gazing upon it.
 this particular night was clear, not a cloud anywhere. i was staring at the sky trying to look for the big dipper, when i noticed one of the stars in the sky moving. at first i thought nothing of it; i figured it was a satellite or a high flying plane. being so bored through the summer, i was conditioned to spending at least a few minutes with whatever caught my attention to help the time go by faster. it was a good thing i didnt't look away, because all of a suddent it stopped and reveresed its orbit! it had been traveling east until it suddenly stopped and began to head west. it didn't need more than a second to make such a drastic turn. 
 it did this several times. in hindsight i now realize it was extremely distant due to its size. it was orbiting very high in our atmosphere, if it was in it at all. all i knewat the time was that it was an unusual thing i was witnessing, so i stared at it for about fifteen minutes before deciding to go in to call my mother to witness the event. i ran in, but she was in the middle of aconversation with my uncle and told me to wait. i tried to explain to her that time was of the essense, and noticing the ugerncy in the tone of my voice she excused herself to come and humour me. when we made it outside, either because it was so distant in the sky or because it had flown out of sight, we could not find it. it's just one of those memories that doesn't dim with time.
content.summary: Saw an unidentifiable light that changed its orbital path several times

content.detailedDescription: I came outside at approx 9:20pm with my mom to let my dog out and smoke a cigarette. i happened to see something out of the corner of my eye and looked up and saw 4 orange spheres traveling southeast. as i continued watching they then turned in a due south direction. i saw approx 10 to 15 more following the original 4 that i saw. they came out of the horizon over the rooftops and tree line in my neighborhood. they were not flashing, and the speed and distance from my location is unknown. the last orange sphere that i saw was gaining altitude higher then the one before it and gaining speed at a much faster rate. there was no rhyme or pattern to these spheres. there was uneven distance between all of them and they were each traveling at different speeds, although it appeared that they were all following the same flight path. i heard no engine noise, and saw no strobe lights whatsoever, nothing but orange spheres about the size of a pea or smaller, 1/8 of an inch, from my location to theirs.
content.summary: Approx 15 - 20 orange spheres traveling southeast then turning due south.

content.detailedDescription: I was playing golf. near lancaster ontario. my brothers were finding there balls on the other fairway. suddenly i looked up. the sky was blue with a few clouds. this ufo was motionless. i never saw metal of its kind there seemed to be straps above the ufo made of metal. half the ufo was hidden by a cloud.Approx 3 minutes later it disapeared. no smoke .Just gone. i did not share this story with my family. they are devout christians and would have told me it was a plane. i am glad to share this story. i have incurable cancer and i always wanted to share my experience with someone without being told i am crazy. i will never forget what i saw that day. what a feeling.
content.summary: Noticed it beside cloud. was not a plane . did not move. then vanished

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were driving eastbound on i-70 threw the utah mountains. while driving threw the san rafael swell area the forest was very close to the highway and it was very dark that night. as we approahed the san rafael valley suddenly about 6 deer jumped from the trees into the highway in front of me causing me to lock up my brakes to keep from hitting them;after i resumed speed i started to drop into the valley below. suddenly something caught my attention to my left, and i turned to look up the valley. thats when my life changed forever; coming down the valley below the level of the mountains about a 100 feet above the ground was a gaint ufo mothership moving very slowly. i had a birds eye veiw because i was above it as it passed down the valley.The ship had a bright red glow it emitted that lite-up the whole valley. you could see everything like on a full moon night..There was no sound...It was a giant disc with a dome in the middle of it, the disc moved counter clock wise and the dome moved clock wise in rotation. the size of the ship in the valley would be about the size of the astro dome in houston texas. it scared the hell out of me causing me to stop my car in the middle of i-70 and get out and watch it pass in front of me moving on down the valley and out of sight..There were no other cars on the highway at the same time..The only other person who saw it was my girlfriend. i lost track of her not long after that for 36 years...When i finally got in contact with her one of the first things she asked me was did i remember seeing the ufo.
content.summary: Birds-eye view of mothership coming in for a landing

content.detailedDescription:
On monday, february 8, 2010i was driving with my daughter on the elgin-o'hare expressway heading toward lake st. when a huge white lightning came down to the north of us.  the area flickered with light (similar to a flickering flourecent light bulb but much brighter) and then an enormous trapezoid shape appeared that was wider than an industrial warehouse, and twice the height.  the entire trapezoid shape was flourent white and the bottom of it was at or near the ground. from the top of this light an enormous beam of light was emitted which lit up the entire sky.  then after a few seconds, the lights went off.  a few seconds later, the same thing occurred.  this happened three times.
i thought it was an explosion or some type of enormous search light, but there was no fire, and no other signs of an explosion.  i had to keep driving but my daughter kept an eye on it, but it "turned off" and we didn't see it again.
there were many cars on the highway and the area has many residential homes. i am hoping someone can explain what this was.  maybe warehouse or store video cameras captured this.  there was no lighning in the area that evening. this occurred about 6:45pm and snow fall began later that evening.
content.summary: Enormous lightning came down and flickered and then a huge flourescent type of explosion occurred with the base of the light a trapezoid. from this trapezoid flourescent white light a huge beam was emittted.

content.detailedDescription:
Jan. 19, 2010

i was taking my daughter home after work on this evening.  it was about 11:00 at night and we were sitting by her mailbox when we noticed lights down the road towards the rental property she lives in on a farm here.  the lights were small, much like backup lights on a car, so we just thought that it was her landlords working on a farm truck.  we sat by the mailbox and waited a minute or so for them to come out of the road.  when after a few minutes, the lights were still there, i pulled my car up closer to the lights.  as we approached them, they backed up into the hayfield.  i had my car window rolled down to listen, as the neighbors entrance, the first on the road  is where the lights were first-on the ground and their dogs were barking and crying and howling!  we didn���t hear any motor noises from the ���farm truck��� and wondered why it backed all the way to the back of the hayfield!  then the two lights got bigger and brighter, though there was no beam.  as soon as we saw them rise up into the air, we knew it wasn���t our friends in any farm truck.  i speed up to catch up and the faster i went, the fast it went.  the , bigger now, lights went up and over the fence of the hayfield, across the farmers road, across the fence to the cow pasture and went along about 15 feet above the ground.  i was speeding at this point, faster than i would have ever driven down the road , maybe 25 mph, but couldn���t catch up.  it flew under some power lines and straight up into the air and behind  my daughter���s house where it ���hung��� there until we got into the lot in front of  her house.  

we sat in front of her house and looked up at the lights for about a minute, when they just ���poof��� went out, or the thing sped away.  we had both  front windows  of the car open by now and can verify that there was not a single sound  of any motor or of any power plant within the ufo.  and again, there was no beam of light coming in our direction or any other.  the lights were just there!

we found out the next day that our friend, the landlady of the farm had seen the lights when she came home, about 30 minutes before we did.  she saw it in the area, above the river, behind the house in about the same location that we had last seen it.  so we know that it had been hanging around for a much longer time than we saw it.

we were all  very happy to see what we know was a ufo.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo lights chased down farm road by mother and daughter in 4wd.

content.detailedDescription:
This is not an event i witnessed. i just let you know that in the local news are presenting the stoy of a luminous sphere-shape object hiting the ground in the state of hidalgo.
aparentley there are hundreds of witnesses, some say it was fireball, others say it was an airplane crashing, and some others say it was a meteor.
the local authority has no official report on what was that.
the local farmers claim that the army is gurading  the impact site.

i don't know if has something to do with ufos but its a curious event.
content.summary: Luminous object impacts on the ground

content.detailedDescription:
On 1-14-10 (thur.) i was driving my car on north on rte 211, near to walmart, in middletown ny, with my grown daughter, who was sitting right next to me in the passenger seat.  it was 7:57pm as i looked at my clock on the dashboard since what i was seeing above me,to the left of me, towards the west (thousands of ft. in the sky,) was something that i couldn't identify. it was a very clear night and these 3 objects shown very brightly which was what caught my attention. what we both saw  a moment later was what looked like 3 planes circling around each other which, in itself, was strange enough, that they were that close to each but while i sat at a traffic light a moment later (lots of traffic on this road now and couldn't pull over since i was caught up in the middle lane) watched these objects now turn themselves into a triangular shape..Sideways, to make it easier to visualize, and was so surprised at seeing them turn into a triangular pattern that i pulled into a parking lot to see more of this (and of course didn't have a camera with me, neither one of us could get a shot with a camera phone, too high in the sky) but then they seemed to disappear. we weren't scared by what we saw just amazed at this very strange 
 
i immediately drove out of the parking lot, drove my daughter home, which was another 5 mins..She lives on a rural road, very dark, wide open so you can actually get a panoramic view of the sky, and in this case, we did..The same 3 objects we had just seen were now back again, but this it was rightside up triangular pattern..We were watching them for a few mins..They didn't move just stayed in the same spot, but as we watched i caught another object passing by on my right..This was indeed closer, maybe 200 ft. high from where we were standing that we could actually see it pass going towards the east..3 white lights across, with a red light flashing directly underneath, and of course listened for any sounds coming from this object..There were no sounds, floated right past us...Heading towards the east of where we were, then disappeared..Didn't have time to get my binoculars so just watched with the naked eye..It was pretty awesome but was disappointed that i couldn't see any type of structure just the lights, but all in all it was an interesting sighting. 

 this all happened in the span of about 15 mins...The 3 lights were still in the triangular shape but it was just too cold to be outdoors so headed inside.

 
 
 
 










--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
content.summary: Reconfiguration of lights in the sky above and to left of me while driving middletown, ny.

content.detailedDescription:
El primero de los incidentes fue durante mi estancia en la ciudad de puebla yo era universitario y me encontraba practicando futbol fuera de la casa donde estaba hospedado, en la calle no hab���a luz de las lamparas pero el cielo estaba despejado y hab���a luna nueva, (lo pueden comprobar con las fechas en que yo v��� los objetos)estaba jugando avent��� el bal���n hacia arriba, cuando volti��� pude ver con la luz de la luna 3 objetos redondos o esferas en formaci���n, en mi experiencia siempre he tenido un buen razonamiento para distancias, temperaturas y velocidad y tomando de referencia la antena de celular que se encuentra a un lado de la casa los objetos sobrevolaban el area unos 350 metros e iban a unos 150 km/hr e iban en una direcci���n sur-sureste.

la segunda vez que pude ver otros objetos parecidos fue en otra parte de la ciudad, los datos exactos son: septiembre de 2006 a las 5:55 am la hora que sali de mi casa para ir a la universidad,al salir de mi casa y cerrar la puerta voltie al cielo y pude observar a 5 objetos en formaci���n en una direcci���n este-sur a la misma velocidad de la anteriores este caso fue muy importante para m��� porque la distancia desde el suelo era menor unos 250 metros, las pude observar mas grandes.

la tercera ocaci���n fue 2 semanas despues iba caminando por la calle que siempre ha estado oscura y se aprecia mejor el cielo, a lo lejos se ven las luces de la ciudad, iba caminando mire hacia el frente y pude ver a lo lejos una especie de burbujas que en la parte alta estaban mas concentradas y abajo habia menos se movia muy rapido yo calculo unas 200 burbujas se movian en una direcci���n similar a la anterior.

y la cuarta ocaci���n fue 1 a���o despues en 2007 iba por la calle llegando a mi casa, y en el cielo pude observar un cilindro como ustedes lo catalogan girando con una luz amarilla abajo y una roja arriba, a unos 600 metros de altura, el cielo estaba despejado se podia ver muy bien pero a diferencia de los demas este se movia mucho mas r���pidopor la distancia no pude calcular esa velocidad, e iba de este-sur.

posteriormente en la ciudad de puebla y cholula se pudieron observar luces rojas arriba de la piramides de la ciudad de cholula as��� como otros avistamientos, actualmente se dice que cay��� una bola de fuego en uno de los municipios de este estado.

no me importa si creen esto yo se lo que v��� de hecho antes no me imaginaba nada de esto. s���lo que esos d���as voltie al lugar correcto para observar estos objetos.

muchas gracias
content.summary: 4 casos diferentes en un lapso de 1 año

content.detailedDescription: I looked up and saw the orb overhead. i snapped a photo but it didn't come out, i switched to video and caught the object moving west. a small black object appears from the top right and passes just below the orb towards the end. then it fades out of sight. later i caught it or something similar.
content.summary: Glistening orb moving west with addtional small probe

content.detailedDescription:
Something caused me to wake up that morning out of a deep sleep and immediately i was compelled to look out my bedroom window to check the weather conditions. as i looked up into the clear starry sky i saw two lights flying approximately the speed of a private airplane. the first light i notices was flying from south to north at an undermined altitude. it appeared to be the size of a pencil eraser held out at arms length. it flashed like the light of an arc welder but emitted  faint colors of blue, red, green light through the bright white light of the object. i knew it was not an airplane since there were no navigation lights blinking. i knew that what i was seeing was "not one of ours," this fascinated me.
the second object i saw i saw almost at the some moment i saw the first object but this one was flying from southeast to northwest over the city. the characteristics were identical to the first object.  the north/south object was a little ahead of the second object so it was further north when the second object crossed its trajectory. i watched them both until they disappeared completely from my view. duration of the sighting was about 3 minutes. 
i have seen this phenomena before in 1995 but then an f-16 was scrambled out of peterson air force base in cos and gave pursuit. that object accelerated before the jet had a chance to even come close. these recent object appeared to have the same characteristics as the object i saw in 1995, that sighting lasted for no more than 30 seconds.
content.summary: Two star-like objects flying over the city one to the north, the other  to the northwest crossing paths over my house

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 2015 hrs cst i witnessed 4 red lights travelling southeast to northwest, in a cross style formation,  approximately 15 miles from my location at the old alton bridge.  the craft appeared to fly very slowly and remained in formation during the entire event.  i lost sight if the lights in the trees.

approximately 45 minutes to 1 hour later we (2 others and i) returned to the town of krum.  there we witnessed 4 lights approaching krum from the north.  as the got closer i could discern a distinct helicopter type sound.  they they closed in close enough that i was able to determine that this was a training flight of helicopters from the jrb/nas fort worth.  i videoed the original event and can barely discern that these were aircraft from the beginning of my viewing event.

the total time for the event would have been 5 minutes for the original sighting and approximately 10 minutes for the subsequent event.
content.summary: 4 red lights in formation

content.detailedDescription:
Hello

this took place in warren, ohio in 1974 to 1976 not sure the year but it was around that time. my best friend john lucia and i was playing basket ball near my house and at the time there was alot ufos going on in this town.Anyway while we were playing ball i stop and look up above my  house across the street i stop playing and saw two very big!  very big!!Circle disc ships in the air and not moving maybe moving very slow they were side by side making no noise at all. i ask my friend about it and he said nothing just looking at each other than we just start playing again. i do remember this that john said ohh my god look the time i need to go supper is waiting and i thought we just started to play how could time go soo fast. keep this in mind we were only kids about 15 years old. would love to find my friend and ask him about what happen. i really dont  think the  ufo took us but!! where did time went?

 guy
need to ask me more please write me

ps wish i had a camera but the picture is in my mind
content.summary: Two teenages playing basketball in the 1970s saw ufo.

content.detailedDescription: Just before 8pm i was outside for a cigarette looking west over the pond behind my house and noticed four red lights moving in formation low across the horizon.The unusual thing about this was first that they appeared to be flying in a single line formation at the same speed on the same course for as long as i could see them.Even with a great deal of private air traffic in this area i have never seen air planes flying in formation before.The second thing that stood out was a lack of white light that you would normally associate with a private air craft.I did not see any strobe or green light only red,while other aircraft were in the same vicinity and showing both red and green lights in addition to the common strobe.I was not close enough to hear any sound or determine a shape,the objects must have been at least a couple of miles away.While i cannot say this was a ufo sighting it was certainly unusual and i would like to know if any other reports have been made.
content.summary: Four red lights flying in formation.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving into our property and saw two small red lights in the sky above our barn.  the sky was dark so the lights showed up well.  they looked a bit like tail lights on a car but up in the sky.  there were also some small blinking white lights that appeared when the red lights had gone off.  we saw the same lights a couple of years back, in the same spot.  do not remember the date but the time was about the same - somewhere between 7:00 pm and 9:00 pm.  when we stopped to look at the lights, they went out.  we started driving again and they came back.  our sons girlfriend, who is staying on the property, said she has been seeing the same lights.  my husband made the comment "look how fast they are moving".  i didn't see them move because i was alternating between the lights and making sure my husband didn't hit anything while driving and looking at the lights.  in trying to keep our 15 year old calm - we didn't make a big deal about it.  he wouldn't go back outside by himself after we got to the house.

the time before when we had seen them there were more lights, maybe 5 or 6, that just hung there then split and left in different directions.  this time i only saw 2 red lights.
content.summary: Two red lights appeared in the southwest sky above our barn.

content.detailedDescription:
I did not notice the objects in person. it was a bright sunny winter day with snow everywhere, so i had sunglasses on.  i was shooting my child and friends as they sled down hill toward me at the bottom.  a couple weeks later, i finally had time to load the shots into my computer and sort the best shots.  i noticed the 3 white flashes across the sky, but didn't give it much thought.  but, seeing it again, i decided to look at my metadata for the photo.  when i saw shutter speed was 1/1600th of a second, i became suspicious.  a plane would have been frozen in place.  like i said, i never saw anything with my eyes.  but, the photographic evidence is striking.  if i had shot at a slow shutter, i would have shrugged it off as planes.  it's as if the object traveled across the sky at a blistering speed, and my camera captured it as the lens opened and shut.   the fact that the 3 white lines are half an inch long, traveling in same direction, with a shutter that was open 1/1600th of a second just defies imagination.  it would take a one or 2 second exposure (camera on tripod) for a commercial jet at 500 mph to leave a half inch blur in same scene. 

 fyi, i was shooting at iso 100 at f/5.6, which explains why the sky is not in focus (short depth of field).  it was with a nikon d700, nikon 70-200mm vr lens shot at 102mm focal length, highest rez nikon raw 14 bit.

none of the other photos i took has this phenomenon, even taken from exact position shooting in exact direction.

answer to questions:
1.  i was at bottom of hill at andover high school shooting up at kids sledding, revealing blue sky above them. i am shooting toward  west south west direction.  (3:02:31 pm, january 23, 2010).
2.  i first noticed the objects while viewing photos on my computer, i shoot in raw, so i have to put them into adobe lightroom to make into jpg.  the photo i am sending is unretouched sky.
3.  first assumed white blurs were falling stars or meteors, something with great speed that naked eye in daylight would not see.
4.  i can only judge it's actions by photo, appear to travel left to right across sky.
5.  not visible in any other photo from that day.
content.summary: I never saw anything at the time of event.  in a photo taken, i see 3 blurred white lines (contrails) in  sky.  photo is 1/1600 second, so the objects speed is incredibly fast.

content.detailedDescription:
You should contact my husband and my son for all the details
my husband has not reported this sighting bacause he fears no one would
believe him. my son was very excited to see something so unbelievable!
i have no idea who you are suppose to call but i feel someone should know what they saw last friday morning, and it should be documinted in case other people saw the same thing.  

thank you,
brandy legay
content.summary: my husband & son looked up & saw object.  they watched as it went side to side & shot into the air.
